snippet: The great 16th-century painter Raphael (1483-1520) is being honored with a rare exhibition focusing on the last period of his life. "Late Raphael" is on display at the Prado through Sept. 16 and moves on to the Louvre from Oct. 8 through Jan. 14.
abstract: The great 16th-century painter Raphael (1483-1520) is being honored with a rare exhibition focusing on the last period of his life. "Late Raphael" is on display at the Prado through Sept. 16 and moves on to the Louvre from Oct. 8 through Jan. 14.

headline.main: Rare Survey of Late Raphael Masterpieces at the Prado
